combat

Class Combat

  • java.lang.Object
    • combat.Combat

  • public class Combat
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used when the player enters in combat. It's responsible for allowing only the current turn owner to make a move, for delaying the enemy's attacks (merely to give a realistic reaction effect, creatures don't normally react in microseconds) and for updating its current state.

      Carries out the player's attack, damaging the mob based on the player's attack skill and giving them experience in attack and hit-points from their battle experience.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Combat

        public Combat(Mob enemy)
        Creates a new Combat instance to control the combat between the player and the specified enemy.
        Parameters:
        enemy - The Mob the player will fight against.

    • Method Detail

      • changeTurn

        private void changeTurn()
        Sets the turn to the other participant. If the enemy is to attack next, don't allow them to attack for at least 1 second from now.

      • getEnemy

        public Mob getEnemy()

      • isPlayersTurn

        public boolean isPlayersTurn()

      • mobAttack

        public void mobAttack()
        Carries out the mob's attack, damaging the player based on their defense skill and giving them defense experience for being hit.

      • playerAttack

        public void playerAttack()
        Carries out the player's attack, damaging the mob based on the player's attack skill and giving them experience in attack and hit-points from their battle experience.

      • runAway

        public void runAway()
        Makes the player attempt to run away from battle. If the enemy is aggroed, or the player fails to get away, the turn advances and the enemy attacks again. If not, the combat state is updated to indicate that the player managed to run away.

      • update

        public CombatState update()
        Checks whose turn it is, and if it is the enemy's turn, has them attack. Otherwise, checks if any participant has died.
        Returns:
        The update result. If it's the enemy's turn to attack, this method call will return CombatState.NO_CHANGES and deaths will be checked on the next game update.

      • useItemInCombat

        public void useItemInCombat(Item item)
        Makes the player attempt to use the specified item in combat. If the item could be used, change turn.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to attempt to use.
